brand.name: TryStyle
brand.tagline: Your Favorite Brands with AI Assistant

hero.title: Your Favorite Brands Now with AI Assistant
hero.subtitle: Find perfect items in partner store catalogs. Smart search understands style, AI consultant helps you choose, virtual try-on shows the result.

features.title: Smart Shopping Experience
features.subtitle: Everything you need to find and try the perfect style.

smartSearch.title: Smart Style Search
smartSearch.description: Find items with queries like 'black knee-length dress' or 'casual work style'

aiStylist.title: AI Stylist Helps You Choose
aiStylist.description: Personal consultant 24/7 helps you pick size, color and complete looks

outfitBuilder.title: Build Outfits from Different Stores
outfitBuilder.description: Create stylish combinations by mixing items from different brands

virtualTryon.title: Virtual Try-On
virtualTryon.description: See how items look on you before ordering

brandCatalogs.title: Your Favorite Brand Catalogs
brandCatalogs.description: All partner store products in one place with unified search

wishlist.title: Wishlist & Notifications
wishlist.description: Save items you love and get notified about discounts

aiChat.title: Your Personal Stylist Always Available
aiChat.description: Ask 'What to wear to the office party?' or 'Do you have these shoes in size 8?' - get instant answers with options from our partner catalogs.

tryon.title: Try Before You Buy
tryon.description: Upload your photo and see how any item will look on you. No disappointments when your order arrives.

catalogDigitization.title: Automatic Catalog Digitization
catalogDigitization.description: All your products automatically appear on the platform

analyticsCustomers.title: Analytics & New Customers
analyticsCustomers.description: Track product interest and attract buyers through AI recommendations

aiConsultant.title: 24/7 Working Consultant
aiConsultant.description: AI answers customer questions about your products around the clock

testimonials.title: Loved by Shoppers and Store Owners

reviews.name: Anna K.
reviews.title: Fashion Lover
reviews.quote: Found the perfect jacket in 10 minutes! The AI understood what I needed better than I did. Virtual try-on showed the size would fit perfectly.

reviews.name: Michael R.
reviews.title: Smart Shopper
reviews.quote: Now I only shop through TryStyle. I can compare prices across different stores and try everything on instantly. Saves time and money.

reviews.name: Elena S.
reviews.title: Boutique Owner
reviews.quote: Sales increased by 35% in a month. Customers find our items through smart search, and the AI consultant works while we sleep.

finalCta.title: Find Your Perfect Style Today
finalCta.subtitle: Ready to discover amazing fashion with AI assistance? Start your style journey now.

businessCta.title: Store Owner? Connect Your Catalog for Free
